author: Predeactor
OofChair
description: Send your image and shorten your URL with your own subdomain.
short: Shorten your link and send your image through a link.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing the SXCU cog from OofCogs. **This cog was created by <https://github.com/Predeactor> but I am now maintaining it.** 

To get started with the cog, go to https://sxcu.net and get a URL, then run `[p]set api sxcu url,[your.url.here]`.
